Deprecated Methods
org.jboss.aerogear.android.authentication.AuthenticationModule.getAuthorizationFields()
          This method has been superseded by AuthenticationModule.getAuthorizationFields(java.net.URI, String, byte[]) 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonResponseParser.getGson()
          This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder) 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonRequestBuilder.getGson()
          This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder) 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.Pipe.getGson()
           
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.getGsonBuilder()
          Pipes are moving to a more generic RequestBuilder interface. GsonRequestBuilder 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.Pipe.readWithFilter(ReadFilter, Callback>)
          in 1.1. Please use Pipe.read(org.jboss.aerogear.android.ReadFilter, org.jboss.aerogear.android.Callback) instead 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonResponseParser.setGson(Gson)
          This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder) 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonRequestBuilder.setGson(Gson)
          This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder) 
org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(GsonBuilder)
          Pipes are moving to a more generic RequestBuilder interface. GsonRequestBuilder
